metadata.title: CVE-2017-9545 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The next_text function in src/libmpg123/id3.c in mpg123 1.24.0 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer over-read) via acrafted mp3 file.

criterions.comment: mpg123: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
